---
name: RPL18B_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae RPL18B promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the RPL18B gene encoding ribosomal protein L18B in S. cerevisiae. This promoter provides constitutive expression coordinated with ribosome biogenesis and growth conditions. It is often used as the canon medium expression promoter in S. cerevisiae.
